casebody.data:
FRANCIS
v.
MUNICIPAL COURT OF WAKE COUNTY, et al. 305P97-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Egbert Francis, for Francis, Egbert Jr. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of December 2018 by Petitioner for Civil Contempt:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
